name: Argomon
effect: ＜Digisorption -3＞ (When one of your Digimon digivolves into this card from your hand, you may suspend 1 of your Digimon to reduce the memory cost of the digivolution by 3.)
digivolve_effect: [When Attacking] You may play 1 level 3 green Digimon card from your hand suspended without paying its memory cost.
